anthers small , basifixed , sometimes apiculate by extension of connective ., 花药小 , 基着 , 有时具细尖的药隔的扩展.

list.abs: ...1.全着药(adnate anther)。指花药全部着生在花丝上。2.基着药(basifixed anther)。指花药的基部着生在花丝顶端。3.背着药(dorsifixed anther)。指花药的背部着生在花丝上。.
(1) 贴着药(全着药adnate anther):花药背部全部贴着花丝上,如玉兰、白兰花的雄蕊。 (2) 基着药(底着药basifixed anther或innate anther):仅花药的基部着.
雄蕊形成两个群的底着 (innate, basifixed) : 花粉囊的底部连着花丝尾的= 底着药
other 5 subequal , anthers basifixed , yellow , small ., 其他 5 枚近等长的 , 花药基着 , 黄 , 小.
anthers basifixed , stamens included ; placentas projecting inward , 2-cleft ; inflorescences cymes , sometimes umbel-like , 1- to many flowered .若乙方愿意购买，在同等条件下，享有优先权。

means.word_mean: 1. attached by its base (as certain anthers to their filaments or stalks)
